Abstract: background : crohn 's disease ( cd ) remain challenging condition , especially patient moderate-to-severe disease . risankizumab ( rzb ) , anti-il-23p19 monoclonal antibody , have show efficacy clinical trial . however , real-world datum ( rwd ) asian population be limited . objectives : to assess effectiveness and safety risankizumab asian patient cd . design : multicenter cohort study . method : study enrol adult patient moderate-to-severe cd receive risankizumab september 2024 and may 2025 taiwan . efficacy be assess week 4 , 8 , and 12 use cd activity index ( cdai ) , patient-reported outcomes-2 ( pro2 ) , and inflammatory bowel disease ( ibd)-disk score . safety outcome and treatment response prior biologic exposure , include ustekinumab ( ust ) , be evaluate . result : forty-nine patient ( mean age 41 . 5 year , 69 . 4 % male ) be include . clinical response rate be 53 . 1 % , 75 . 5 % , and 91 . 8 % week 4 , 8 , and 12 , respectively ; clinical remission be achieve 12 . 2 % , 22 . 4 % , and 42 . 9 % . pro2 remission reach 53 . 5 % week 12 . cdai and ibd-disk score improve week 4 , 8 , and 12 statistical significance ( p < 0 . 0001 ) . transmural healing be observe 16 . 3 % patient week 12 . clinical remission week 12 be consistent regardless prior ustekinumab exposure ( expose 36 . 36 % naïve 44 . 74 % , p = 0 . 630 ) or biologic-naïve status ( expose 36 . 84 % naïve 63 . 63 % , p = 0 . 119 ) . severe adverse event be report , but mild event include headache and transient liver enzyme elevation ( 2 . 04 % ) . conclusion : risankizumab may demonstrate significant short-term efficacy and favorable safety real-world treatment moderate-to-severe cd asian cohort . long-term datum be need to confirm sustained outcome and guide optimal use diverse cd population .

Title: polymerase-associated factor 1 complex modulate growth-defense tradeoff
Authors: Guo Y, Li C, Liu Y, Mao H, Zhang Y, Genschik P, Wang L, Yan S
Abstract: plant have evolve sophisticated mechanism to balance growth and defense . evolutionarily conserve polymerase-associated factor 1 complex ( paf1c ) play multiple role transcription . here , show paf1c regulate growth-defense tradeoff repress defense gene expression arabidopsis . loss paf1c lead increase expression defense gene , enhance disease resistance , but compromise growth . mechanistically , paf1c bind defense gene , interact histone deacetylase , such hda6 , to promote histone deacetylation , thereby repress defense gene expression . plant immune hormone salicylic acid ( sa ) promote interaction paf1 and sa receptor npr1 , function e3 ubiquitin ligase to mediate polyubiquitination and degradation paf1 . genetically , loss paf1 suppress immune defect npr1 mutant , support notion paf1 function downstream npr1 . collectively , study identify npr1-paf1c-hda6 module regulate growth-defense tradeoff .
